com.almasb.fxgl.scene.menu

Class FXGLDefaultMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.scene.FXGLScene
      • com.almasb.fxgl.scene.FXGLMenu
        • com.almasb.fxgl.scene.menu.FXGLDefaultMenu

  • public class FXGLDefaultMenu
extends FXGLMenu
    This is the default FXGL menu used if the users don't provide their own. This class provides common structures used in FXGL default menu style.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)
